alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 9:46PM PST until December 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that will likely be impacted by the gusty winds include Highways 101 and 118.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
